attributes.action: ALL MPS MUST SUPPORT THE DEMOCRATIC MAJORITY VOTE OF THE PEOPLE AND BACK OUR PM.
attributes.additional_details: SO THE BRITISH PEOPLE ARE BEING BETRAYED BY THE VERY PEOPLE THEY ELECTED TO UPHOLD THEIR DEMOCRATIC MAJORITY DECISIONS AND THEIR WILL.  THOSE MPS, WHO BETRAY THE PEOPLE, SHOULD RESIGN IMMEDIATELY.  THE TRUTH IS THEY WILL DO ANYTHING TO STOP BREXIT AND TO DEFY THE BRITISH PEOPLE.  WELL, THE BRITISH PEOPLE WILL NOT STAND FOR THAT!  IF THE PM IS FORCED TO HAVE A GENERAL ELECTION, THEN THE BREXIT PARTY WILL MOST DEFINITELY WIN THAT ELECTION AND AT LEAST WE WILL BE RID OF MPS WHO BETRAY THE PEOPLE.
attributes.background: THE WORLD IS WATCHING AND THE DEMOCRATIC WILL OF THE BRITISH PEOPLE AND THEIR MAJORITY VOTE IS BEING OVERRULED AND BETRAYED BY SOME MPS, WHO ARE NOT FIT FOR PURPOSE.  THE TRUTH IS THEY WILL DO ANYTHING TO STOP BREXIT AND TO DEFY THE BRITISH PEOPLE.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

It would be up to individual MP's to decide whether to resign.

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347
